comments:
Summary: DBCS3.3: "Paste" did not complete in variable field in Datapool overview tag. 

Description:
 Build date: Eclipse 3.3M6, TPTP 4.4.0 2007-03-27
 OS: Redhat Enterprise Linux V5.0 
 Steps to recreate problem:
        1- Create a Datapool in Test Assets, New > Test Element... 
        2- Specify a CVS file for the datapool 
        3- Input some data in the datapool.
        4- Save the datapool, then open "Overview" tab.
        5- Copy any characters in a text editor, and then paste it in variable field of the overview tab.
        6- Returns error message such as "Paste" did not complete normally. Please see the log for more information. The following is the log. 

<logfile>
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 2007-04-03 02:54:08.823
!MESSAGE "Paste" did not complete normally.  Please see the log for more information.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2007-04-03 02:54:08.824
!MESSAGE java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
!STACK 0

 Expected output:
 Paste works fine. There is no error messages.

Created an attachment (id=62632)
Screen capture of error message in Datapool
Jerome, this appears to be a functional defect specific to Linux. I could not reproduce it on Windows (XP SP2) using the TPTP-4.4.0-200703270100C driver.  Please investigate.
